name: SpeechGrammarList.addFromURI
description: The addFromURI() method of the SpeechGrammarList interface takes a grammar present at a specific URI and adds it to the SpeechGrammarList as a new SpeechGrammar object.

refs.name: Web Speech API
refs.description: The definition of 'addFromURI()' in the 'Web Speech API' specification.
